question: Who believed that the history of society was one of <image 1>?
description: The image features two men engaged in an arm-wrestling match. The background is a solid color, and there is text at the top that reads "CLASS STRUGGLE." Below the arm-wrestling scene, there is additional text that says "GAME of life in Capitalist America!" The overall theme of the image suggests a metaphorical representation of class struggle within capitalist societies.
